item.title: 6 Superhero Movies That Proved They Could Skip The Origin Story
item.description: Superhero movies are increasingly skipping origin stories and assuming audiences are already familiar with the characters, with some notable success.

item.title: Star Wars' Best TV Show & Fan-Favorite Movie Have Both Proven Something Major About Retcons
item.description: The best Star Wars TV show and a fan-favorite movie have strangely collided in 2025, proving a big point about retcons in the franchise.

item.title: Clueless' Relationship Between Cher & Josh Was Problematic For 2 Reasons That Prove The '90s Movie Has Aged Badly
item.description: The central romance between Cher and Josh in the Clueless movie has earned a reputation as a controversial and problematic relationship.
